dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Where am I? It's so dark in here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown Voice
dialogues.text: You are in the realm of shadows. Only those with courage can navigate through it.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: I am not afraid. Guide me, so I successfully navigate through it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown Voice
dialogues.text: Very well, go forth with your bravery. Make sure to trust your instincts.
